concept.title: Task
concept.shortdesc: An explanation of the Task DITA information type.

conbody.p: The Task topic is one of the three base DITA information types.

li.p: Used for documenting step-by-step procedures or stages within processes.
More strictly structured compared to concept and reference topics.

section.title: Question Addressed
section.p: Task topics answer the question "how to?"

section.title: Root Element
section.p: The root element of a Task topic is <task>.
